verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the ungodly, <S%H7563><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of sinners, <S%H2400><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> sitteth <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the scornful. <S%H3887><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> his delight <S%H2656><s%> is in the law <S%H8451><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and in his law <S%H8451><s%> doth he meditate <S%H1897><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night. <S%H3915><s%>

And he shall be <S%H1961><s%> like a tree <S%H6086><s%> planted <S%H8362><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the rivers <S%H6388><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> that <S%H834><s%> bringeth forth <S%H5414><s%> his fruit <S%H6529><s%> in his season; <S%H6256><s%> his leaf <S%H5929><s%> also shall not <S%H3808><s%> wither; <S%H5034><s%> and whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> he doeth <S%H6213><s%> shall prosper. <S%H6743><s%>
The ungodly <S%H7563><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> so: <S%H3651><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> are like the chaff <S%H4671><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> driveth away. <S%H5086><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the ungodly <S%H7563><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> stand <S%H6965><s%> in the judgment, <S%H4941><s%> nor sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the righteous: <S%H6662><s%> but the way <S%H1870><s%> of the ungodly <S%H7563><s%> shall perish. <S%H6><s%>
